title: Phineas and Ferb
details: This is a game based on the popular Disney cartoon Phineas and Ferb. I made it using Google App Inventor, back when I just started learning how to program. It currently has over 2 million downloads

title: SoundBytes
details: This is an android app, where you record audio clips, apply filters to it then send to friends. This was influenced a lot by snapchat. It was made by a team a four as part of a class project
